item.title: World War I
item.description: Total War Lord Kitchener -> British icon! (America took this poster) Conscription (drafting) governments took economic control… regulation of resources raw materials & food stuffs bicycle factory taken over by government made munitions & rifles rationing food “war of attrition” = whoever runs out of troops and resources loses (first time deciding factor) women & contract laborers maintained factory production government propaganda campaigns to maintain morale (civilians’ view of war) Changing Gender Roles Russian Revolution 1917 (Romanovs) amidst anarchy of WWI (inevitability, or opportunism?
